title: Valuable House with Land for Sale in Minuwangoda.
details:
A valuable 58 perches House with Land for sale in Veyangoda Road, Minuwangoda. House consist of 5 Bedrooms, Bathrooms, Pantry, Kitchen, Servant toilet, Verandah. Just 10minutes drive to Minuwangoda Town. House facing to Nittambuwa and Katunayaka Airport main road. Good residential and Commercial Property.

Suitable for residential or commercial (Medical Clinic, Nursery, Government and Private Bank or Company ).

Close to Banks, Financial Institutions, Government & International School, Super Markets and otherlocation. Easy access to all urban places.
